item.title: Whisky
item.description:
Nose

bacon, bean paste, some charcoal, some maritime flavor, a bit medicinal flavor, some citrus

Taste

Medicinal, beans, seaweed, some lemon, a bit of malty sweetness, yellow fruity notes

Finish

Some bean paste, charcoal, some seaweed, brown sugar

item.title: Brandy
item.description:
Nose

cucumber, honey, caramel, umami, grape, cream, vanilla, some cinnamon, damp wool, stewed apple

Taste

wtf, lots of weird spices. star anise, black pepper, bit of tanning, underripe melons, not quite sweet, some hint of grape (like a grappa)

Finish

like a pot of stewed meat, lots of spices like cardamom, star anise, nutmeg, some maillard reaction, caramel, a bit saltiness

item.title: Mezcal
item.description:
Nose

ginger, pepper, plastic, rubber, petrol, paint, molasses, olive, grass, a little bit funkiness, yogurt, little bit of pepper

Taste

from pineapple, coffee, sugarcane to petrol, plastic, sesame, almond, tannin

Finish

almond, sweet, grass
